name: Swordplay
description: Proficiency with bladed melee weapons including swords, daggers, and knives. Master parrying, thrusting, and saberlike trajectories.
notes: Essential for warrior caste members. Each level grants +1 HP. Requires sapient intelligence and weapon crafting.

name: Archery
description: Skill with ranged weapons including longbow, crossbow, and horn bow. Improves accuracy and effective range.
notes: Critical for distance combat and hunting large game. Requires crafted weapons and training.

name: Unarmed Combat
description: Hand-to-hand fighting and wrestling techniques. Warriors train combat with both arms.
notes: Grants significant HP bonus. Each level grants +2 HP. Universal skill available to all species.

name: Stealth
description: Move silently and remain hidden. Avoid detection by targets and enemies.
notes: Essential for assassins, hunters, and ambush tactics. Universal skill available to all species.

name: Lockpicking
description: Open locks, break restraints, and bypass security mechanisms without keys.
notes: Specialized skill. Maximum 1 level at character creation. Requires sapient intelligence and tool manipulation.

name: Capture & Restraint
description: Subduing, binding, and tracking quarry. Includes capture knot (tied in under 3 Ihn) and slave capture techniques.
notes: Critical for capturing slaves and subduing enemies without killing. Universal skill available to all species.

name: Slave Training
description: Train slaves in obedience, skills, and various disciplines. Slaver caste specialty.
notes: Specialized skill. Maximum 1 level at character creation. Requires sapient intelligence and social understanding.

name: Sexual Pleasing
description: Pleasure slave techniques, seduction, and the arts of sensual service.
notes: Specialized skill. Maximum 1 level at character creation. Essential for pleasure slaves. Requires sapient intelligence.

name: Hunting
description: Track, stalk, and kill game animals. Includes butchering and hide preparation.
notes: Essential survival skill. Each level grants +1 HP. Universal skill available to all species.

name: Fishing
description: Catch fish using nets, lines, and spears. Includes both river and sea fishing techniques.
notes: Important food source in coastal and river regions. Universal skill available to all species.

name: Cooking
description: Food preparation, preservation, and recipe creation. Essential domestic skill.
notes: Valued skill in all cultures. Requires sapient intelligence and fire control.

name: Blacksmithing
description: Metalworking including weapon smithing, tool crafting, and repair.
notes: Specialized craft skill. Maximum 1 level at character creation. Metal Workers caste specialty. Requires sapient intelligence and tool mastery.

name: Brewing
description: Production of ale, wine, paga, and other fermented beverages.
notes: Profitable trade skill. Paga is especially valued. Requires sapient intelligence and fermentation knowledge.

name: Medicine
description: Heal wounds, treat illnesses, perform surgery. Includes knowledge of poisons and antidotes.
notes: Physicians take oath to heal all who ask, regardless of status or caste. Requires sapient intelligence and medical knowledge.

name: Literacy
description: Read and write in Gorean script and other languages. Rare skill, somewhat undignified for warriors.
notes: Many warriors choose to remain illiterate or semi-literate. Scribes excel at this skill. Requires sapient intelligence and language comprehension.
